scripts.test: cross-env FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST="localhost:$(cat firebase.json | jq .emulators.auth.port)" FIREBASE_DATABASE_EMULATOR_HOST="localhost:$(cat firebase.json | jq .emulators.database.port)" FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST="localhost:$(cat firebase.json | jq .emulators.firestore.port)" cypress run
scripts.dev: astro dev --host & firebase emulators:start & stripe listen --forward-to http://localhost:5001/vintedbot-3f0d6/europe-west1/ext-firestore-stripe-payments-handleWebhookEvents && fg
